title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer and reason

v(1.5)=1.5sin( 1.5 2 )=1.167 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4CAD@

Up, because v(1.5) > 0

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: a(1.5)

1 point is earned for the conclusion and reason

a(t)= v ′ (t)=sin t 2 +2 t 2 cos t 2 a(1.5)= v ′ (1.5)=−2.048 or −2.049 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6608@

No; v is decreasing at 1.5 because v'(1.5) < 0

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447C@

1 point is earned for: y( t )=− 1 2 cos t 2 +C

1 point is earn y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt = ∫ tsin t 2 dt =− cos t 2 2 +C y(0)=3=− 1 2 +C⇒C= 7 2 y(t)=− 1 2 cos t 2 + 7 2 y(2)=− 1 2 cos4+ 7 2 =3.826 or 3.827 ed for: y(2)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447C@

1 point is earned for: y( t )=− 1 2 cos t 2 +C

1 point is earned for: y(2)

y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt = ∫ tsin t 2 dt =− cos t 2 2 +C y(0)=3=− 1 2 +C⇒C= 7 2 y(t)=− 1 2 cos t 2 + 7 2 y(2)=− 1 2 cos4+ 7 2 =3.826 or 3.827

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447C@

1 point is earned for: y( t )=− 1 2 cos t 2 +C

1 point is earned for: y(2)

y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt = ∫ tsin t 2 dt =− cos t 2 2 +C y(0)=3=− 1 2 +C⇒C= 7 2 y(t)=− 1 2 cos t 2 + 7 2 y(2)=− 1 2 cos4+ 7 2 =3.826 or 3.827

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for: y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447C@

1 point is earned for: y( t )=− 1 2 cos t 2 +C

1 point is earned for: y(2)

y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt = ∫ tsin t 2 dt =− cos t 2 2 +C y(0)=3=− 1 2 +C⇒C= 7 2 y(t)=− 1 2 cos t 2 + 7 2 y(2)=− 1 2 cos4+ 7 2 =3.826 or 3.827

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447C@

1 point is earned for: y( t )=− 1 2 cos t 2 +C

1 point is earned for: y(2)

y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt = ∫ tsin t 2 dt =− cos t 2 2 +C y(0)=3=− 1 2 +C⇒C= 7 2 y(t)=− 1 2 cos t 2 + 7 2 y(2)=− 1 2 cos4+ 7 2 =3.826 or 3.827
